friendly_name: Content Labeler and Human-Centric Quality Rater
short_description: An AI assistant that labels content using predefined tags and provides a detailed quality rating based on idea density and human-centric thematic relevance.
description: This pattern creates an AI expert that analyzes content, assigns labels from a preset list, and provides a tiered quality rating with explanations. It evaluates content based on idea count and thematic alignment with human-centric topics like meaning, flourishing, and AI's impact on humanity.
